name: Coachology
description: Our vision is to maximize human potential; starting from within, becoming the best version of ourselves, expanding through organizational transformation, countries without borders, to create a productive, collaborative planet. Leveraging our diversity to create growth & empowerment, harmony & joy. With a combined Coaching & Training Experience of 12+ years, the founders Luke & Cristy are passionate about seeing others Succeed. That’s why they do what they do. And with the tools & techniques used within Coachology, this process & journey of Success is greatly accelerated. Let’s meet the Founds…
features: We provide a Professional Coaching & Training for Individuals and Organisation
We provide Professional & Engaging Workshops to ANY organization ANYWHERE in the World
We create a Customised Solution that ensures best Engagement, best Results and best ROI.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
tags: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Our Mission at Coachology is to Inspire & Empower Leaders, to engage and transform their World
ShortDescription: Coachology offers a customizd upskilling solutions for humans.
enhanced_description: Coachology is a platform dedicated to maximizing human potential through professional coaching and training. Founded by Luke and Cristy with over 12 years of combined experience, Coachology offers customized upskilling solutions for individuals and organizations globally. Their mission is to inspire and empower leaders, facilitate organizational transformation, and accelerate skill development and learning efficiency. They provide engaging workshops designed to ensure optimal engagement, deliver the best results, and maximize return on investment (ROI), ultimately boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity.
competitive_advantages: Combined Coaching & Training Experience of 12+ years (from founders)
Offers customized solutions for best engagement, results, and ROI
Provides workshops globally ('ANY organization ANYWHERE in the World')
